name: Hey Dan!
description:
Y'know when someone waves at you and you eagerly wave back? But then you realize that that someone was waving at somebody else, and you don't actually know that person, and you wish you could disappear under a rock? Now you can enjoy that anytime!

Made at the Global Game Jam 2017 at the Playcrafting + Microsoft jam site in Manhattan by:

Konstantin Boyko
Jordan Lysenko
Aaron Santiago
Priyal Seebadri
Dan Sinensky
